name: Hamtaro Ham-Hams Unite!
description: The loveable little hamster Hamtaro challenges you to reunite all of his hamster pals. You must complete puzzles and figure out the unique hamster language to accomplish your task. Your dictionary will automatically record hamster terms for future use like the hamster greeting, "Hamha." You'll learn more than 80 words in the Ham-Ham dictionary as you interact with the heartwarming creatures from the popular animated television show. Meet all of Hamtaro's friends like Jingle, Snoozer and Cappy.
